member.name: M:DocumentAPI.Controllers.DocumentRequestController.GetEntities
member.summary: Get the initial list of Entities. Each entity has a distinct set of Categories.

member.name: M:DocumentAPI.Controllers.DocumentRequestController.GetDocumentCategories(System.String)
member.summary: Get list of Document Categories available for a given Entity. Each document category is mapped to a Repository in the ApplicationXTender.
member.param: The Name property of the selected Entity

member.name: M:DocumentAPI.Controllers.DocumentRequestController.GetDocumentList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Pass the Entity Name and Category Name to retrieve a full list of documents and their attributes for that Category.
member.param: The Name property of the selected Entity
The Name property of the selected Category

member.name: M:DocumentAPI.Controllers.DocumentRequestController.GetFilteredDocumentList(DocumentAPI.Infrastructure.Models.Category)
member.summary: Pass a Category object with filters applied in the body of the request to retrieve a filtered list of documents and their attributes.

member.name: M:DocumentAPI.Controllers.DocumentRequestController.GetDocument(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Pass in the category name and document id, and receive back the PDF represented by that id from the ApplicationXTender Repository.
member.param: The Name property of the category object's Entity, which represents the Entity (Organization) which the Category belongs to
The Name property of the category object, which represents the name of the Category as a repository in ApplicationXTender
The Id that uniquely identifies the document in the ApplicationXTender repository
